about.heading: About us
about.p1: We are a martial arts group studying the rich traditions of Historical European Martial Arts (HEMA), with a focus on Bolognese sidesword from the 16th century.
about.p2: As part of AEMMA, our Ottawa chapter is committed to training, scholarship, and preserving martial heritage.

training.title: Training
training.text: We study and apply historical techniques from authentic manuscripts.

history.title: Rich history
history.text: Our methods are rooted in the martial traditions of the 15th and 16th centuries.

community.title: Supportive, inclusive community
community.text: We welcome martial artists of all levels and backgrounds.
